title: Suggestion: use the system pager to display `go help` topics
body:
I'm brand-new to Golang.

I'm using golang 1.5.1 on Ubuntu, on a Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-5600U CPU @ 2.60GHz.

I typed `go help gopath`.

I expected to see the beginning of the help at the top of the screen, much like a man page would.

Instead, I saw "when the vendor experiment is enabled, ..."

My suggestion is to use whatever the system pager is to output that information; it knows what to do. I have no idea what to do for Windows, though. Sorry.
